title: async / await
description: The `async / await` JS syntax keywords are used to work with asynchronous operations.
content: The keywords used to handle asynchronous code in JavaScript, making it easier to work with promises. The `async` keyword is used to define functions that return a `Promise` object and `await` pauses the execution of the function in which it's used until the promise is resolved or rejected, allowing for more readable and structured code, while other code continues executing.
